lics.sourcenote: THIS TEXT IS THE ORIGINAL SOURCE CODE. This is NOT a full styled and published dictionary. As such it can and will contain unfinished entries, unpublished entries, entries with objectionable translations, etc. If you find any errors or want to add more words, download the file, edit it, and send it back to mailto:divvun@samediggi.no and mailto:giellatekno@hum.uit.no. Please also note that the entries are not necessarily sorted, or could be wrongly sorted.

mg.lexicon: the little houselike objects on top of graves in the orthodox religion
вид лососёвых рыб из рода лососей
рыболовная застава, плетень поперёк реки для ловли лосося
